title: Create user-intent-analyzer for request interpretation

description.summary: Missing agent for sophisticated user request analysis and intent recognition. Required for user experience enhancement and accurate request interpretation.
description.business_value: User experience enhancement through sophisticated request interpretation
description.technical_scope: Develop analysis agent for user intent recognition and request parsing

functional: Analyze user requests for intent and context
Enhance command selection through better understanding
Generate user interaction analytics and insights

implementation.approach: Deploy user experience specialist with intent analysis capabilities
implementation.architecture: Intent analysis framework with pattern recognition and insights
implementation.validation: Intent recognition testing and accuracy validation
implementation.testing: Comprehensive analysis and user experience testing

risks.mitigation: Comprehensive pattern training and validation testing

acceptance_criteria: Agent analyzes user intent with high accuracy
